actions: Replace one short car trip per week with walking or cycling.
Combine errands to cut down on car trips.
Practice gentle acceleration and maintain proper tyre pressure to save fuel.
Try having one meat-free meal each week.
Wash clothes in cold water to save energy.
Air dry laundry once a week instead of using the dryer.
Turn off lights when leaving rooms to save electricity.
Switch off unused appliances to reduce energy consumption.
